instruction_manual.name: Instruction Manual
instruction_manual.description:
# System Architecture Guide

Welcome to KodeKloud Computer Quest!

You are inside a computer system infected with multiple viruses. Your mission is to explore the system, learn about computer architecture, and locate all the viruses hiding in different components.

Basic commands:
-go : followed by a direction (n, s, e, w, up, down)
-take : pick up an item
-look : examine your surroundings or a specific item
-read : read text content of items
-scan : use on areas to detect virus presence
-quarantine : use on viruses once found

The system has multiple levels, from the CPU to storage to networking. Each area represents a real computer architecture component with its own function. Learn about them as you explore!
